## getEnum() function

Returns the list of enums registered for a `path` in a Model / Resource.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getEnum<T>(cls: Ctor<T>, path: keyof T): string[];
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cls | [Ctor](./goosetyped.ctor.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; |  |
|  path | keyof T |  |
